hero.name: Krrish Sehgal
hero.tagline: Building secure blockchain solutions and AI-driven systems. GSoC & Summer of Bitcoin contributor with expertise in Bitcoin, machine learning, and full-stack development.

profile.shortBio: Software Engineer specializing in blockchain development, AI systems, and secure applications. Currently pursuing BTech in Computer Science at JIIT.
profile.longBio: Passionate software engineer with expertise in blockchain development, machine learning, and full-stack applications. Selected for both Google Summer of Code (OWASP Foundation) and Summer of Bitcoin (Unchained Capital) in 2025. Winner of Smart India Hackathon 2024 with 300,000+ participating teams. Active open-source contributor across various projects and maintainer of multiple GitHub repositories.

projects.title: Bitcoin QR Tools
projects.description: A comprehensive suite of Bitcoin tools for generating and scanning QR codes for Bitcoin addresses, transactions, and PSBT workflows. Features include address validation, transaction parsing, and multi-format QR code generation for seamless Bitcoin payments.

projects.title: WebAuthn Bitcoin Playground
projects.description: Interactive playground exploring WebAuthn integration with Bitcoin wallets. Demonstrates passwordless authentication and secure key management for Bitcoin transactions using FIDO2/WebAuthn standards, combining modern web security with cryptocurrency workflows.

projects.title: NWC Playground
projects.description: Pure Nostr Wallet Connect implementation playground for testing all NWC commands with Bitcoin Connect integration. Features real-time command execution, transaction history viewer, and quick zap interface for Lightning Network payments with support for all NWC protocol methods.
